text: Werneria (smalltongue toads) is a genus of true toads. They live in Cameroon and Equatorial Guinea. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Werneria bambutensis Bamboutos Smalltongue Toad Werneria iboundji Werneria mertensiana Mertens' Smalltongue Toad Werneria preussi Buea Smalltongue Toad Werneria submontana Werneria tandyi Tandy's Smalltongue Toad ==References== * , 2004 Revision of the genus Werneria Poche, 1903, including the descriptions of two new species from Cameroon and Gabon (Amphibia: Anura: Bufonidae) Zootaxa 720: 1â€“28 ==Other websites== * . 2007.
